blot.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to make a wet surface become dry by pressing soft paper or cloth on it
blot.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a mark or dirty spot on something, especially made by ink
blot.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a building, structure etc that is ugly and spoils the appearance of a place
blot.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: The new power station is a blot on the landscape.
blot.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: something that spoils the good opinion that people have of someone or something
blot.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: The increase in juvenile crime is a blot on our time.
